mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRITERIAS ( YEAR, CRITERIA_GUBUN, SCHOOL_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, ACCEPTED_COUNT, CSAT_REFLECTED_SCORE, PHYSICAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, INTERNAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, INTERVIEW_REFLECTED_SCORE, TOTAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, CRITERIA_MEMO, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{year}, #{criteriaGubun}, #{schoolId}, #{departmentId}, #{acceptedCount}, #{csatReflectedScore}, #{physicalReflectedScore}, #{internalReflectedScore}, #{interviewReflectedScore}, #{totalReflectedScore}, #{criteriaMemo}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT -- 입시 요강 정보 A.CRITERIA_ID, A.YEAR, A.CRITERIA_GUBUN, A.SCHOOL_ID, A.DEPARTMENT_ID, A.ACCEPTED_COUNT, A.CSAT_REFLECTED_SCORE, A.PHYSICAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, A.INTERNAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, A.INTERVIEW_REFLECTED_SCORE, A.TOTAL_REFLECTED_SCORE, A.CRITERIA_MEMO, A.CREATED_AT, A.UPDATED_AT, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_BY, -- 학교 정보 B.SCHOOL_NAME, -- 학과 정보 C.DEPARTMENT_NAME, -- 등록한 사람, 수정한 사람 D.USER_NAME AS CREATED_USER_NAME, D.USER_PHONE AS CREATED_USER_PHONE, E.USER_NAME AS UPDATED_USER_NAME, E.USER_PHONE AS UPDATED_USER_PHONE FROM CRITERIAS A LEFT JOIN SCHOOLS B ON B.SCHOOL_ID = A.SCHOOL_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS C ON C.DEPARTMENT_ID = A.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN USERS D ON D.USER_ID = A.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN USERS E ON E.USER_ID = A.UPDATED_BY WHERE A.CRITERIA_ID = #{criteriaId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CRITERIAS WHERE CRITERIA_ID = #{criteriaId} LIMIT 1
